text: "I Can't Live Without My Radio" is a 1985 song by LL Cool J and is the leading single from his debut studio album Radio. It went to number 15 on the Billboard R&B; singles chart. ==Track listing== ===A-Side=== # "I Can Give You More"- 4:16 ===B-Side=== # "I Can't Live Without My Radio"- 4:12 == References == Category:1985 songs Category:LL Cool J songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: I Can't Live Without My Radio
